data.name: COH 2 - Soviet Commander: Mechanized Support Tactics
data.detailed_description:
SOVIET COMMANDER: MECHANIZED SUPPORT TACTICS
Counter a variety of threats with well-armed infantry, air cover, and heavy 152mm artillery.

  • IL-2 PRECISION BOMBING STRIKE
    The IL-2 will make a high-speed bombing run, clustering four FAB-50 50kg bombs into the target area.
  • ISU-152 HEAVY ASSAULT GUN
    The powerful ISU-152 Heavy Assault Gun can be deployed to the battlefield.
  • MARK VEHICLE
    Targeted vehicle is subject to an increase in focused fire from nearby opponents.
  • ANTI-TANK GUN AMBUSH TACTICS
    All mobile anti-tank gun crews can hide their weapon and camouflage themselves.
  • GUARDS RIFLE INFANTRY
    Dispatch a Guards Rifle Infantry squad to the target position
This DLC is already included in the Digital Collector’s Edition.

data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Czech, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows Vista (32bit), Windows 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 20GB
  • Video Card: 256MB Direct3D 10 capable video card (GeForce 8800 or RadeonHD 2900)
  • Additional: Internet Connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 1.8Ghz Intel
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 512MB (Nvidia 6xx series or later, AMD 7xxx series or later and Intel Iris Pro).
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 2.4Ghz Intel
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB (Nvidia 780MX, AMD D700 or R9 295X)
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 2.6 GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 1GB*
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    *Requires an Intel Iris Pro graphics card or an NVIDIA 600 series graphics card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 3.4 GHz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent.
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB**
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    **NVIDIA 760 series card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
